title: [K-12] Urban Rail Demand Forecasting Simulation-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic statistics and data analysis concepts, along with general knowledge of urban transportation systems
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education using VR simulations in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, with learning effectiveness monitored via formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain temporal and spatial influencing factors in urban rail demand forecasting.
Learners can visualize passenger inflow/outflow patterns in virtual rail networks using simulation tools.
Learners can build a basic demand forecasting model by applying multidimensional data analysis techniques.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
